title.en: Return Of The King Of Power

description.en: Shen Ping'an saved the uncle who was confused by the ability after failing the college entrance examination. After this incident, an invisible black hand slowly surrounded him. Youka, who charms Tiancheng, and Shen Ping'an are people in two worlds. Because of Shen Ping's absorbing power and divine consciousness, they coexist as one. The Celestial Ability Academy, the gathering place of the Abnormal Humans, is here...what will their lives be like, what will the black hands behind them do...
